type.docs:
**string**: The type of light. This is used to specify if it is an RGBW or RGB light and in which order the colors are. Defaults to `GRB`. Change this if you have lights with white channel and/or the colors are in the wrong order.

*See also: [NeoPixelBus Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/neopixelbus.html#configuration-variables)*

variant.docs:
**string**: The chipset of the light.The following options are supported:
  * `800KBPS` (generic option, recommended for chipsets without explicit support)
  
  * `400KBPS`
  
  * `WS2811`
  
  * `WS2812`
  
  * `WS2812X`
  
  * `WS2813`
  
  * `SK6812`
  
  * `TM1814`
  
  * `TM1829`
  
  * `TM1914`
  
  * `APA106`
  
  * `LC8812`
  
  Additionally the following two-wire chipsets (set `data_pin` and `clock_pin`) are supported:
  * `WS2801`
  
  * `DotStar`
  
  * `LPD6803`
  
  * `LPD8806`
  
  * `P9813`
  
  

*See also: [NeoPixelBus Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/neopixelbus.html#configuration-variables)*

method.docs:
**string**: The method used to transmit the data. By default, ESPHome will try to use the best method available for this chipset, ESP platform, and the given pin. See [methods](https://esphome.io/components/light/neopixelbus.html#neopixelbus-methods) for more information.

*See also: [NeoPixelBus Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/neopixelbus.html#configuration-variables)*

invert.docs:
**boolean**: Invert data output, for use with n-type transistors. Defaults to `no`.

*See also: [NeoPixelBus Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/neopixelbus.html#configuration-variables)*

pin.docs:
**[Pin](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin)**: The pin for the data line of the light.

*See also: [NeoPixelBus Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/neopixelbus.html#configuration-variables)*

clock_pin.docs:
**[Pin](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin)**: The pin for the clock line of the light, for two-wire lights.

*See also: [NeoPixelBus Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/neopixelbus.html#configuration-variables)*

data_pin.docs:
**[Pin](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin)**: The pin for the data line of the light, for two-wire lights.

*See also: [NeoPixelBus Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/neopixelbus.html#configuration-variables)*

num_leds.docs:
**int**: The number of LEDs attached.

*See also: [NeoPixelBus Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/neopixelbus.html#configuration-variables)*
